package.name: Urbn_RST_Message_Style
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Urbn is simple, functional, with just a touch of style. If you're tired of glossy, shinny, bubbly, over the top rounded corners with drop shadowed nonsense then urbn's for you.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=1602
